handover.summary: Completed comprehensive deep analysis of the entire SknApp codebase. Created a 27KB detailed report covering architecture, backend, frontend, database, WebSocket system, LINE integration, security, and code quality. Context7 MCP had API issues, so manual analysis was performed by reading 65+ Python files and 38+ TSX files.
completed: Analyzed 65 backend Python files (models, endpoints, services, schemas)
Analyzed 38+ frontend TSX files (pages, components, hooks)
Analyzed WebSocket live chat system with rate limiting
Reviewed LINE integration architecture (webhook, intents, handoff)
Evaluated code quality for both backend and frontend

next_actions.action: Review the comprehensive analysis report at research/kimi_code/sknapp-codebase-deep-analysis-2026-02-04.md
Address security gaps: Add JWT middleware to admin endpoints
Remove WebSocket dev mode auth for production
Add test coverage (backend pytest, frontend Jest)

notes: The codebase is in good operational condition. The analysis report contains 10 major sections with architecture diagrams, code examples, security assessment, and 9 specific improvement recommendations. Context7 MCP had API key issues, so all analysis was done manually by reading source files.
